name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kofax MarkView Tab Control for JWS

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open all MarkView Viewer instances in a single browser tab, if you use Java Web Start to run Oracle Forms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension prevents creating multiple tabs for every document opened in MarkView Viewer, when clicking Get Next in Oracle E-Business Suite. Without MarkView Tab Control for JWS, the browser using JWS opens every document in a new tab.

Disclaimer: this plug-in is a packaged version of a technical workaround that is available as source code from Kofax Technical Support. The plug-in is provided along with the source code only for purposes of convenience. The plug-in is not part of the Kofax MarkView product and is not subject to support commitments associated with Kofax MarkView.
